name: Briar House
description:
***IMPORTANT: This is a text-based game with instances of TIMED TEXT. Clicking on the page before the timed text appears will cause the text and any text following to NOT APPEAR AT ALL. You will have to refresh the page by clicking the back arrow at the top left of the screen or reloading the webpage.***

*Scroll down to the bottom to see content warnings*. 

You've heard of the ghost stories about BRIAR HOUSE, of the atrocities that happened to the family that once lived there, and now you're going to find out the truth.

Summoned by a mysterious letter, it's up to you how far you'll go to search the twisting passageways and decrepit rooms of this ghastly estate.

Step foot into the haunted halls of BRIAR HOUSE—

if you dare...

*Content Warnings* SPOILERS

Language, Implied Dismemberment, Implied Child Death, Jarring Animated Text, Alcoholism, Transition into A Bright Screen, and Timed Instances

Royalty Free Images photos from: https://pixabay.com/

Thank you to my testers!! I appreciate you taking interest and the time to play my game. It pushed  me to continue making it better! : ) : ) : ) : )
